title: TFT Counting Towards Awakening Missions
body:
Hey all!

My TFT games are counting towards my awakening mission cast abilities and ultimate, how does that work exactly? Not complaining or anything would just like to know so I can work towards it, at the moment I only have 1/20 ultimates cast aha.

Thanks :)

replies.body: its probably a bug. just do it in norms
